subject: Videos: Manual tuning using an old Motorola stereo.
author: Jamie Churchill
full_text:
These are videos I've made of an old Motorola Solid State stereo radio,
which I am manually tuning on FM and AM, respectively.

FM: http://youtu.be/p20xGaH4TCQ
AM: http://youtu.be/zNxUoDBX9L8

Jamie
